owl:Ontology.dc:title: The GECKO Ontology
owl:Ontology.dc:description: A suitable Ontology for the GECKO distribute architecture

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Agent
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing a general agent in the GECKO distribute architecture

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Transportation Module
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing a transportation module agent in the GECKO distribute architecture

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Working Machine
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing a working machine agent in the GECKO distribute architecture

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Functionality
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing agents' functionalities in the GECKO distribute architecture

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Action
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing action functionalities of an agent. This sub-class models functionalities able to produce an effect in the environment, e.g. move something.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Channel
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing channel functionalities of an agent. This sub-class models all types of actions that are able to move something within the production environment.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Change Over
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing change over functionalities of an agent. This sub-class models all types of actions that are able to change the internal capabilities of the agent.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Component
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing components of an agent in the GECKO distribute architecture

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Information
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing information components of an agent. This sub-class models all types of components that neither change agent's capacities nor act on the elements of the production environment but characterize agents' behaviors

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Actuator
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing actuator components of an agent. This sub-class models all type of components that affect the elements in the production environment by changing their status. Actuators are the basic components that allow agents to operate in the environment according to their capabilities.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Port
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing ports of an agent. This sub-class models components that make the agent able to cooperate with other agents in the production environment

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cross Transfer Engine
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing cross transfer engines of an agent in the GECKO distribute architecture.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Conveyor Engine
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing conveyor engines of an agent in the GECKO distribute architecture.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Topology
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing topology information about the agent and the overall shop floor

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Neighbor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing neighbor information of an agent

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Component State
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Class representing the possible states of agents' components
